posts.author: Kalistez
posts.content: Just a heads up, you need 25 caster levels to not be affected by Greater Dispel these days (Assuming you're playing EE)

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
A Halfling (or Gnome) dual-wielding Kamas will have a -4 AB penalty, unlike the medium-sized  races which get only a -2 AB penalty, because the kama is not small enough for the off-hand of a small race.

You will want your BAB to be 25 so Divine Power can give you the extra attack at full AB, not -15.

Divine Power only lasts a short time.  All the rest of the time, your Strength will be only 6, and you will really regret that.

Monk 6 gives you KD / IKD for free, which can free up 2 feats to be used for something else.

f you take Fighter 6 on an epic level, you could get Epic Weapon Spec for +4 damage.

posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content: Thank you. Too much things i was not aware about halflings !
